participant_1.background:
I'd have lunch with my dog, because she's always there for me, no matter what.
i do not like vegetables.
i can also squat 400 pounds.
I enjoy listening to all sorts of music, and I love sharing my favorites with my students.
I like to go to car shows and corvette forums online to learn more about my car and see what other people are doing with theirs.

participant_2.background:
I listen to my favorite bands to relax when I'm not at work.
I don't care about the weather
I'm always trying to come up with new beats for my band.
i am currently single but i am ready to mingle.
I am ten years old and my family is like a library.

content.text: Hello! How are you?
I'm doing well! I'm a little tired from working all day, but I'm looking forward to relaxing tonight.
That's good to hear! I'm glad you're having a good day. I'm also a little tired, but I'm looking forward to spending some time with my dog.
Dogs are great! I love dogs. I have a dog named Buddy.
That's awesome! I have a dog named Sadie.
What kind of dog is Sadie?
She's a pitbull mix.
Pitbulls are great dogs! I love their personalities.
Me too! They're so sweet and loving.
What's your favorite thing to do with Sadie?
I love to take her for walks and play fetch with her. She loves playing fetch.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I love playing fetch with my dog too.
It's the best!
Have you ever been to a car show?
No, I haven't. Have you?
Yes, I have! I went to one last year with my family. It was a lot of fun.
That sounds like it would be fun! I've always wanted to go to a car show.
You should go! It's a lot of fun.
I will!
Great!
It was nice talking to you!
You too
